name: BoShek (V)
Lore: 'Rogue pilot. Outlaw starship tech. Has secret lab in Mos Eisley. He bragged about beating Han Solo''s Kessel Run record. Left fringe life behind after meeting Obi-Wan Kenobi.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Deploys -2 to Cantina, a docking bay, or a starship. BoShek is a matching pilot for any starship. Twice per game, may take a device into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition < 3.',
